channel.title: What would you like to see in a game [IDK IF IN RIGHT PLACE MOVE IF NEEDED]
channel.description: Ok so I want to make a really awesome game. It might not even be a RSPS , but it will include pk , skills , multiplayer, etc. The usually good kind of game stuff. Well I would like EVERYONE to post what they like to see in games,what they expect games to have,what is fun in a game,etc. stuff like that. Maybe some good programs and guides to use for games also. BUMP is needed too. I want everyone to be able to view this.

item.title: What would you like to see in a game [IDK IF IN RIGHT PLACE MOVE IF NEEDED]
item.dc:creator: @Hepheeway Hepheeway
item.description:
@Hepheeway wrote:

My site is loading so long, do you can suggest anythink?
Thanks a lot.
adolibrus
Lexus originated from a clandestine flagship sedan project, code-named F1, which began in 1983 and culminated in the launch of the original Lexus LS in 1989
